FuncDef: This command provides a mechanism to configure the committed burst size for the policer. It is recommended that CBS is configured larger than twice the maximum MTU for the traffic handled by the policer to allow for some burstiness of the traffic. CBS is configurable for dual-bucket bandwidth policers only.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an integer value defining size, in kbytes, for the CBS of the policer. Values-0 to 131071.
